summary: An Dwemer lab which enables you new craftables and conjuration spells
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffffff][size=3]Visit the field labaratory of Mersiha Garnier,an dwarven enthusiast who developed some spells according to Dwarves,
and has perosnal Dwarven staff crafting table.
If you want to craft thou,you must have Dwarven Smithing perk.On other hand all spells are level 50.

[u][b]Spells :[/b][/u]

Conjuration :
Summon Prima Donna [i](summons an Female Levitating Automaton)[/i]
Summon Guardian Spiders Duo[i] (Conjures 2 dwarven guardian spiders)[/i]
Summon Dwarven Sentinel [i](Summon an spirit soldier outfited in Dwemer armor,armed with battleaxe)[/i]
Summon Dual Dwarven Spheres [i](summons two levitating dwarven spheres which fire bolts)[/i]
Summon Mechanical Serpent [i](Summons an worm automaton)[/i]

Alteration :
Hack [i](Command Greater dwarven automaton)[/i]
Corrode [i](Infflict damage on dwarven automaton of 7 pts for 30 sec.)[/i]

[u][b]Staffs :[/b][/u]
Dwarven Condensor[i] - Produces Steam[/i]
Dwarven Command Rode - [i]Command any Automaton[/i]
Dwarven Disruptor -[i] Fires electric pulses[/i]

Also if you are interested at Dwarven culture,Mersiha has a number of Dwemer items for sale.[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]For all of those who are interested in how it is possible to conjure automaton,please download an version with journal,
in which there is Mersiha's Journal which explains her methods. :)[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][u]Version 2.0 - [/u]Added new craftable items and introduced Ore Of Aether into their recipes.
For ore thou you need Five Quicksilver Ingots,Three Flawless Amethysts and Dwarven Dynamo Core to craft in smelter into Raw Aether.

1.Aethereal Minimal Shield (Chameleon 50%)  
2.Aethereal Shard Necklace (resist poison 80%,resist disease 20%) 
3.Ring Of Messer (Unenchanted)
4.Ring Of Secunda (Unenchanted)
5.Aethereal Immitation Circlet (magicka fortified by 50 pts and regenerates 25% faster)
6.Mathematical Amulet  (Smithing fortified by 70pt and stamina by 30pts)
7.Dwarven Master Crossbow (Unenchanted)

Version 2.1 - Replaced the Dwarven Condenser with these one [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17515]Dwarven Condenser[/url]﻿.
[/size][/font]

[font=Arial][color=#000000][size=3][i]Credits :
CCOR and Core for clutter and URW for shield
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38778]Kiwi-Hawk[/url] for circlet,Lautestanni for rings,[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26957]UltimatePowa[/url] for crossbow,
Oaristys for necklace,[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44317]MaegFaer[/url] for chameleon spell
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17515]Orain[/url] for dwarven condenser
[u]Considering new creatures,all credits goes to Vicn.You can check out his profile,if you have not already.He has some really cool mods,and his creature pack is really top of art if you ask me.
Thx again ![/u][/i][/size][/color][/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
